author: Florida
title: Nov 21 | Thanksgiving Wine Pairing | Clearwater, FL Patch
text:
Clearwater|Local Event
Thanksgiving Wine Pairing
Join us Nov 21st, from 7-8:30 pm at Aspirations Winery for Thanksgiving wine pairings! $40 for seasonal bites & great wines. Reserve now!
Get ready to sip, savor, and celebrate the flavors of fall! Join us at Aspirations Winery for a Thanksgiving-themed wine pairing, where we're blending the warmth of the season with the artistry of our wines. Each glass will be thoughtfully paired with holiday-inspired bites, crafted by our staff to bring out the best in each wine
Picture it: velvety reds and crisp whites paired with roasted turkey, ham, stuffing and more favorites! We’ll explore how each wine harmonizes with classic Thanksgiving flavors, from cranberry sauces to savory herbs.
Round up your friends and family and make some new holiday memories with us! Whether you’re a Thanksgiving food fanatic or simply love a good pairing experience, this evening promises a heartwarming blend of fun, food, and fantastic wine.
